name: appwidget
author: @濯焰

sections.description:
With appwidget you can easily share your Android app on your blog posts.

For example if you need to promote the Appchina app ( Market link for Appchina ) which has com.yingyonghui.market as package name, you only need to insert com.google.android.youtube in your editor and it will generate: * icon * name * developer * rating of the app.

Website: http://i.appchina.com/wp-plugin/
sections.installation:
1. Put this under plugins folder (/wp-content/plugins).
  2. Go to Admin->Plugins and activate the plugin “appwidget”.
sections.changelog:
0.1

First release.

0.2

Add search function.

0.3

  1. Fix bug.
  2. Beautification display effect.

short_description: This plugin lets you easy access to information on any Android application the appchina.com market.
